DOC.brief_summary: Benfotiamine pretreatment (3 days)at high dosage (1050 mg/day) prevents in healthy subjects smoking-induced vascular dysfunction assessed by ultrasound flow mediated dilatation of the brachial artery.
DOC.brief_title: Benfotiamine Prevents Vascular Dysfunction in Healthy Smokers
DOC.detailed_description: Benfotiamine pretreatment (3 days)at high dosage (1050 mg/day) prevents in healthy subjects smoking-induced vascular dysfunction assessed by ultrasound flow mediated dilatation (FMD) of the brachial arteryand laboratory parameters (adhesion molecules).
